name: 陳涵秀
objective:
臺灣對於「文化資產」的認定，主要來自於〈文化資產保存法〉的確立，本課程介紹臺灣文化資產保存法的發展脈絡，以及各項有形與無形文化資產的類別和價值，使學生對於文化資產有概略性的了解，並能對於臺灣當代文化資產相關議題有所涉略，並進行案例觀察與分析。
This course aims to introduce the concept of hertiage in Taiwan, both the tangible and intangible hertiage. The development of Cultural Heritage Preservation Act in Taiwan is taught in this class, and further, different case studies of heritage preservation, conservation and restoration are also examined. By taking this class, students will be able to observe and analyse hertiage issues from cultral, social, economical and aesthetics perspectives.
